briefdescription.para: Each of the following _mc fields are stored in map-coordinates, NOT screen-pixels.

inbodydescription.para: Transform the mouse coordinates into axis-correct map-coordinates
Use the color specified by the user
Set up OpenGL states (for drawing smooth-shaded plain-colored lines)
Draw a fullscreen-sized crosshair over the cursor
Draw the horizontal precision line (in two pieces)
Draw the vertical precision line (in two pieces)
Cycle to next mode, wrap if necessary

memberdef.argsstring: (int nDim1, int nDim2, idVec3 vMinBounds, idVec3 vMaxBounds)
memberdef.name: PaintSizeInfo

memberdef.argsstring: (int nDim1, int nDim2, idVec3 vMinBounds, idVec3 vMaxBounds)
memberdef.name: DrawSelectedCentroid

inbodydescription.para: If precision crosshair is active, force redraw of the 2d view on mouse move
Force 2d view redraw (so that the precision cursor moves with the mouse)
